entry.title: La Réunion - occupation du sol - carte 2021 (Spot6/7) - 1.5m (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)

entry.title: Aphid infestation on sugarcane and interaction with agronomic parameters in Tanzania 2017-2021 (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)
entry.content:
Aphid infestation on sugarcane and interaction with agronomic parameters in Tanzania 2017-2021
Apr 28, 2022 - AIDA
Goebel, François-Régis; Bosquet, Didier; Hardy, Yann, 2022, "Aphid infestation on sugarcane and interaction with agronomic parameters in Tanzania 2017-2021", https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/GC5NCV, CIRAD Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:7B98d8vbeVSg48YPpFkM5Q== [fileUNF]
This data has been collected on sugar estate in Tanzania (TPC) in the framework of an expertise on Aphid population and damage in sugarcane and interaction with different agronomic parameters, from 2017 up to now.

VIS-NIR spectra of organic resources collected in Madagascar from livestock, urban or agrobusiness origins. Detailed description of origin, animal species, by-products types, and compositional analysis are at https://doi.org/10.18167/DVN1/YRMQ52

entry.title: Compositional analysis of organic resources with animal, agro-industrial, and urban origins collected from different regions of Madagascar (Newly published Datasets from Cirad Dataverse)

entry.title: Jebel Jais – A Mountain in the Desert. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
ROULER

Jebel Jais – A Mountain in the Desert. What might you expect from a bike ride in the desert? Sand in your face, crosswinds dragging at your wheels, and an unbearable heat? Not quite. The United Arab Emirates is a burgeoning cycling scene in a place you might not expect.

entry.title: Nissa La Bella: Float Down to the Carnival. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Nissa La Bella: Float Down to the Carnival. Held officially since 1873, the Nice Carnival is one of the world’s most celebrated parades. Millions of people flock to the city each year and it is yet another reason for us to celebrate our home – Nissa La Bella.

entry.title: Ride & Create: Izu Ani. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA VIE

Ride & Create: Izu Ani. Izu Ani is a well-known chef on the Côte d'Azur, he has a habit of appearing at the Café du Cycliste in the port of Nice like magic. When he enters the place, he completely inhabits it with his energy and charisma, changing the atmosphere in an instant.

entry.title: Jérôme Cousin: From the Peloton to the Desert. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
ROULER

Jérôme Cousin: From the Peloton to the Desert. Less than a year ago, Jérôme Cousin was still a professional bike racer. He’s ridden in some of the world’s greatest races, including the Tour de France. Now, pedalling in the desert, riding a bike loaded with luggage, Jérôme’s only onlookers are the occasional farmer and his camels.

entry.title: Étienne Hubert: Paris by Night. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Étienne Hubert: Paris by Night. Adventure is around every corner on a bike, even in Paris in winter. Olympic canoeist and Caravan member, Étienne Hubert, takes two kayaking veterans on a twilight tour of Paris.

entry.title: Introducing CDC GT. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
ROULER

Introducing CDC GT. Café du Cycliste’s first official racing team. Bringing together three dedicated riders, all hungry for big adventure on mixed terrain, the project will take them across the globe to experience the best of the world’s gravel competition.

entry.title: #WHATISGRAVEL - The Film. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
FILMS

#WHATISGRAVEL - The Film. Gravel is a playground with infinite possibilities. Gravel is being able to ride anywhere, any time. Gravel is a dizzying feeling. Gravel is constantly renewed wonder.

entry.title: Centifolia Lookbook SS22. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
COLLECTIONS

Centifolia Lookbook SS22. Created with local inspiration from Grasse, Provence’s perfume capital, Café du Cycliste’s new Centifolia collection is blooming with cultivated colour. Ride into summer smelling the flowers, and magically transport yourself to perfumed Provence.

entry.title: A Rose by Any Other Name. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
COLLECTIONS

A Rose by Any Other Name. A stone’s throw from the birthplace of Café du Cycliste, Grasse is the French capital of perfume and rose cultivation. The Centifolia is known as the Provence Rose, and is a gift from the land of the region.

entry.title: Guillaume Néry: Diving in at the Café. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Guillaume Néry: Diving in at the Café. It took five magical minutes to understand the dimension of free-diving champion and Caravan member, Guillaume Néry. To watch him sit and hold his breath for five minutes was a drop in the ocean on the way to understanding what’s required in this super-human sport.

entry.title: Anton Krupicka: Farwell to Winter. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA MAISON

Anton Krupicka: Farwell to Winter. It is said that the ride should be about the journey, not the destination. However, for Anton Krupicka and Hailey Moore, a recent trip in the Colorado mountains proved it’s about both.

entry.title: The Best Brasucade in the World. (La Gazette de café du cycliste)
entry.content:
LA VIE

The Best Brasucade in the World. A meal at the end of exploring the Camargue, home to flamboyant flamingoes and brooding bulls. Fresh Mediterranean mussels from the local fishing port, with a sauce made of olive oil, herbs and Pastis.

entry.title: The BWR Shakeout Ride is Back for 2022 (Gravel Cycling Gear Blog — Gravelstoke)
entry.content:
The BWR Shakeout Ride is Back for 2022

Just ahead of the 2022 BWR, we are happy to bring back the 2nd annual SHAKEOUT IN THE HILLS on Thursday, April 28, 2022. We had a blast in 2021 when we kicked off the new tradition on our backyard trails of San Elijo Hills not far from the official Belgian Waffle Ride venue. For 2022 expect much of the same good times, chill vibes, and friendly faces as we return to San Marcos for an evening of gravel community.

Read More
NewsDave MalwitzApril 14, 2022bwr, belgian waffle ride, gravel ride, shakeout ride, san elijo hills, lost abbey, shakeout in the hills

entry.title: Lost and Found Gravel Returns for 2022 (Gravel Cycling Gear Blog — Gravelstoke)
entry.content:
Lost and Found Gravel Returns for 2022

Sierra Buttes Trail Stewardship has announced that the Lost and Found Gravel Festival will return in 2022, in partnership with long-time cycling production team, Breakaway Promotions. Lost and Found will run on June 4th, 2022, and the proposed routes will feature a 100-mile route with 8,447 feet of elevation gain. Shorter 35 and 60-mile routes are also available.

Read More
NewsDave MalwitzMarch 17, 2022gravel race, lost and found gravel, sbts, sbts gravel event, breakaway promotions, portola 0 Comments

entry.title: Ergon Announces New Gravel Bar Tape (Gravel Cycling Gear Blog — Gravelstoke)
entry.content:
Ergon Announces New Gravel Bar Tape

Here at Gravelstoke we are huge fans of Ergon, a German brand that creates high-quality products for MTB and road with special attention to ergonomics. Ergon has now moved to the cockpit with the launch of drop-bar-specific products for improved comfort including a remastered CF seatpost, BT Bartapes, and Orthocell® under-tape inserts.

Read More
NewsDave MalwitzMarch 16, 2022ergon, best handlebar tape, best bar tape, bar tape, handlebar tape 0 Comments

entry.title: Film: 72 Hours In Patagonia AZ (Gravel Cycling Gear Blog — Gravelstoke)
entry.content:
Film: 72 Hours In Patagonia AZ

Nestled just 18 miles north of the Mexican Border, Patagonia is in the heart of the Desert Southwest and up until recently, has been one of the best-kept secrets for gravel riding over the past decade. Just one of the smattering of towns in the San Rafael Valley, Patagonia is suffused with Sonoran culture that brings a unique blend of sights, sounds, smells, and traditions to the region.

Read More
Videos, ReportsDave MalwitzMarch 11, 2022enve, ventum, patagonia az 0 Comments

entry.title: Otay Mountain Gravel Adventure Guide (Gravel Cycling Gear Blog — Gravelstoke)
entry.content:
Otay Mountain Gravel Adventure Guide

The Otay Mountain Wilderness is located in San Diego, CA and the area is a great location to explore on a gravel bike with its long dirt road climbs and terrific views. In this Gravel Adventure Guide, we take a closer look at the region and offer a suggested gravel route to experience the mountain.
